title: Unorthodox
description: Feeling trapped, Esty flees her ultra-Orthodox community in Brooklyn for a new life in Berlin.

title: After Life
description: To face his grief, a cynical journalist decides to live life to the fullest and say whatever, however he wants.

title: Vis a vis
description: Macareina Ferreiro never thought she would end up in prison. But when she is arrested for a crime she didn't commit, she has to learn to survive in a world where the rules are different.

title: The Place
description: A mistery man grantes wishes to people who visit his cafe. In excange, the man wants these people to do some tasks,wich are against any ethical or moral code.

title: Summertime
description: Two young people meet in a summer camp and fall in love. But when the summer ends, they have to face the reality of their lives.

title: Brot
description: Many people, apparently not related, are found brutally killed all across Iceland. A tormented norwegian detective is brought to the case to try and find a link between the victims.

title: Alias Grace
description: This is the story of a maid who falls victim of a young phisician's sinister obsession.

title: Virgin River
description: Looking for a new beginning, a young nurse moves to a remote town in Northern California. But she soon discovers that the town is not as idyllic as it seems.

title: The English Game
description: A lavish costume drama intertwines with a historical account of the origins of football in England.

title: The Kominsky Method
description: This series tells the sotry of andy Komintsky, a retired actor who is trying to make a living as an acting coach.

title: Permission
description: A couple of college sweethearts finds out, just before the wedding, that maybe they are not as close-knit as they thought.

title: The house of flowers
description: A wealthy matriarch tries to save faces when her husband's mistress reveals some twisted family secrets

title: Collaral Beauty
description: A mourning publicist writes letters to love, time and death. But when these letters are answered, he has to face the reality of his life.

title: Self-Made
description: Based on a true story, an afro-american laundry woman becomes a millionaire by creating her own line of beauty products.

title: Freud
description: Looking for fame, a young Sigmund Freud teams up with a medium to solve a series of murders in Vienna.

title: Grace and Frankie
description: Grace and Franky are speechless when their husbands reveal that they are in love with each other. But when the shock wears off, they became unexpectedly close friends.

title: Let Yourself Go
description: A psychoanalyst meets a personal trainer who changes his life forever.

title: Dogman
description: This movie pictures the Canaro case, i.e. the homicide of the criminal boxer Ricci, committed by the dogman -er canaro- of Rome.
